title: coffee shop
description: A static website for a Coffee Shop that features multiple sections with various animations and a language switch feature.
details: This coffee shop website is a static website consisting of multiple sections. It includes a language switching feature between English and Arabic, along with animated elements to enhance user experience.

title: home provider
description: A frontend design for a real estate company catering specifically to Arabic-speaking users.
details: This real estate website caters to Arabic users and features a visually appealing design with a diverse range of sections. It provides a seamless browsing experience, showcasing properties and relevant information in an attractive manner.

title: tm tool
description: A task management system designed for efficient collaboration within a team.
details: The task management website enables administrators to create groups, add members, and assign tasks to them. It provides a centralized platform for efficient task distribution and collaboration, enhancing productivity and organization within teams.

credentials.info: To access the member login, please use the provided credentials. If you wish to view the platform as an admin, please create an account or log in via Google.

title: cure tools
description: Dynamic website for a dental tool manufacturing company with admin and user sides.
details: That is a manufacturing company's website specializes in providing surgical tools for dentists. It features two sides: an admin side for managing operations and a customer side for purchasing products. Customers can conveniently browse, select, and make payments for their desired tools directly through the website.

credentials.info: To access the admin login, please use the provided credentials. If you wish to view the platform as a customer, please create an account or log in via Google.

title: my todo
description: A to-do app that allows users to schedule and manage their upcoming tasks.
details: The to-do app allows users to schedule tasks, update them, and reschedule as needed. It provides a convenient platform for managing and organizing tasks, ensuring users stay on top of their responsibilities and can easily adapt to changes in their schedules.

title: simple calculator
description: A simple calculator built using jQuery.
details: It is a simple calculator, built using jQuery, performs basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. It provides a user-friendly interface for inputting numbers and obtaining accurate results for calculations.
